Trooper:

"What maximals faction have to... find her, sir? Silverwings, Pac=
ificus or better... Watchers??" asked the male
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 17, 200=
5 10:42 AM
  Subject: Re: Balistica up and running


  Jotunn lifted his ma=
ssive and brutish form from the throne he had been
  seated in. He commande=
d the bay window to open, and light started
  flooding the room.

  Jotunn:=
 You have good ideas, soldier, but you must push your thoughts
  further...=
 Erase her memories, implant the spy relay. Alol that she
  will experience=
 will be sent to our computers. Also...

  He turned to the trooper for the=
 first time, revealing a monstruous
  visage.

  Jotunn: ... hide a helium =
bomb in her. It has to be undetectable and
  devastating at the same time. =
She will be our first blow on the
  Maximals when we are ready.

  --- In n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
  > Trooper:
  > 
  =
> "YEs sir... if you let me..."said the trooper doubing"The femme
  could b=
e usefel, even if she refuses; you see, perhaps if we erase her
  memories =
until she arrived here and set her in stasis... we could gave
  her to Paci=
ficus Maximals or even Silver wings... If we instal a chip,
  she could hel=
p us to spy those factions and that would let us crush
  them or in case th=
at situation is needed, she could be a lil gift of
  peace to other Maximal=
 faction but her presence here must be hidden...."
  >   ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  >   From: Nic 
  >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  >   Sent: =
Saturday, July 16, 2005 10:14 AM
  >   Subject: Re: Balistica up and runnin=
g
  > 
  > 
  >   Jotunn: This is surprising news indeed... Here are my ord=
ers: install
  >   a Loyalty chip in this Windlord. He must be brought unde=
r my control!
  >   After that, activate him. He will still think he is a m=
aximal, but he
  >   will think our option is the best one. Try to make him=
 convert
  >   Balistica. If she doesn't join... terminate her. Understood?=

  > 
  >   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
=
  >   > Trooper:
  >   > 
  >   > "YEs sir"replied the male while he looked=
 those scary red eyes"One
  >   of the maximals, the somehow useless, it's =
a femme, her name is
  >   Balistica., I'm not very clear with her backgrou=
d: it seems that she
  >   came her behind someone very important in Cybert=
ron council; she's
  >   actually, funcional and under a high vigilance;  I=
 don't like that she
  >   go around and lost. The other one is a male; his=
 current status is
  >   stasis lock, I guess that it's the best, sir, but =
he has a tight
  >   vigilance too. Acording with data banks that was taken=
 from the ruins
  >   from he comes, his name is Windlord and was here befo=
re that the lost
  >   ones come to this planet and his joined them, and he=
 participates in
  >   most battles before our arrival, in his data banks s=
howed that he an a
  >   femme were Unicron's prisioners, but they ran away=
, after that his
  >   records are destroyed...  "
  >   >   ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  >   >   From: Nic 
  >   >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
  >   >   Sent: Friday, July 15, 2005 5:46 PM
  >   >   Subject: Re: Balist=
ica up and running
  >   > 
  >   > 
  >   >   The room was dark. The air w=
as damp, as if there was a jungle
  in it.
  >   >   Yet, at the same time,=
 there was a chilling breeze passing
  through the
  >   >   room. Then, so=
mething moved, and two huge red eyes were
  looking at the
  >   >   troope=
r.
  >   > 
  >   >   Jotunn: Tell me more... What are their names, and whi=
ch is
  which? What
  >   >   is their potential? Answer me...
